OBB is a New Startup!

OBB is a new, growing student-created database for all genres and all styles of books. Primarily created for the benefit of children and adults, OBB is the latest advancement in helping people read with more joy.



Our Mission

OBB is a website set up by four students made to assist children in their learning. What we offer


High-quality book reviews suited to the teenaged reader


Online Community to discuss the interesting ideas in our books


Book recommendations based on your preferences

Our Values

Engagement

Our online community can help young readers stay engaged with the content they're reading. OBB doesn't focus only on comprehending the reading material, but also critically analysising it and responding to it to build your own opinion. This way, you can get the most out of your book!

Security

Security is the top priority for us, so security was a major consideration when we coded up this website. We use trustworthy sources to keep your information safe.

Schoolwork

English exams can be frightening and confusing, but OBB's detailed and easy-to-read analysis on many common books, including Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet, are written by other school students to give you a firm grasp on what you need to know to prepare for your next English exam.

Top Recommendations

Percy Jackson

Mythology, Action

A twelve-year-old Percy discovers he’s a demigod, the son of Poseidon! As he navigates the challenges of adolescence and ancient mythology, Percy must embark on a thrilling quest to retrieve Zeus’s stolen lightning bolt, all while battling mythical monsters and uncovering secrets about his past. Packed with humor, adventure, and heart, this modern twist on Greek mythology is loved by many on OBB! ~ Recommended by Anthony

Harry Potter

Fantasy, Magic, Friendship, Action

Step into the enchanting world of Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, where eleven-year-old Harry discovers he’s a wizard destined for greatness. After a lifetime of neglect, he receives a letter inviting him to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where magic is real and adventure awaits. As Harry makes new friends and uncovers the mysteries of his past, he must confront the dark forces that threaten his new world. Filled with wonder, friendship, and courage, this timeless classic will sweep you into a realm where anything is possible! ~ Recommended by Anthony

Keeper of the Lost Cities

Historical Fiction, War, Realism, Friendship, Compassion, Tradegy

A twelve-year-old Sophie Foster discovers she’s not just an ordinary girl but a powerful telepath with a mysterious past. When she’s whisked away to a magical realm filled with fantastical creatures and hidden dangers, Sophie must navigate the complexities of her new life while uncovering secrets that could change everything. With the fate of both her worlds hanging in the balance, Sophie’s journey is a thrilling blend of adventure, friendship, and self-discovery that will keep you captivated from start to finish! ~ Recommended by Olivia & Emily

The Book Thief

Historical Fiction, War, Realism, Friendship, Compassion, Tradegy

The Book Thief follows a girl called Liesel Meminger in Nazi Germany. After her brother’s death, Liesel begins her lucrative childhood career of thievery. As Liesel navigates the dire consequences of the war and the oppressive Nazi regime, she also discovers the fecundity of words. However, tragedy strikes at the wrong moment. With wholesome characters and an innovative narration style, this piece of historical fiction is a must-read for teens and young adults! ~ Recommended by Emma

It's All Free!

These amazing resources are all free! Join us today to start reading and writing reviews and engage with our wonderful community! Signing up only takes a few seconds! Let's read together on OBB!

Note this is a child-friendly platform. Adults are welcome, but this site and community is built with teens and children in mind.

Before you sign up, please make sure you've read our Terms of Service. Unlike other platforms, we make our ToS readable so you can be more informed, so please take a moment to read it.
